title: 120+ Birthday Wishes & Quotes to Send to Your Girl Best Friends

steps.title: Write a sweet and snappy birthday wish to get the party started.
steps.content: Write a sweet and snappy birthday wish to get the party started. These adorable messages are sure to make your friend feel loved and get her pumped for the big day. Send your wish in the morning so she wakes up with a smile, or add them to your caption to give her a birthday shoutout on Instagram! Happy birthday to my ride or die. I’d do anything for you! Happiness is seeing your best friend succeed. Happy birthday! Happy birthday to a friend I can always count on. Thank you for everything! Friends are the family we get to choose. Happy birthday to my sister for life! You make me smile every time I see you. Wishing you the best birthday ever! When I count my blessings, our friendship is at the top of my list. HBD, bestie! Wishing a day of joy to my number one friend! Love you to the moon and back! Hope your birthday is as beautiful and vibrant as you are. I’m so lucky to be your friend! Through thick and thin, I’ll always be by your side. Sending you so much love on your special day! Where would I be without you? I don’t know, and I don’t want to know! Happy birthday to my day one! Today, we celebrate the sweetest and most stylish person I know. Happy birthday to my forever friend. Baby, you light up my world like nobody else…but seriously, I’m so glad I’m your friend. Love you forever, and happy birthday!

steps.title: Reference an inside joke or tease her about aging for loads of laughs.
steps.content: Reference an inside joke or tease her about aging for loads of laughs. Trying to add a touch of humor to your birthday card? Throw out a witty joke or one-liner to make your friend laugh out loud. Studies show that humor can strengthen relationships. Sweet, sexy, and smart…but enough about me. Happy birthday to you! Your birthday is the best excuse to get drunk on a weekday. Bottoms up! Every day, we celebrate you…but today, you get a card. Happy birthday! Don’t let aging get you down…because it’s way too difficult to get back up! I got you the best present in the whole world—ME! Happy birthday, gorgeous! Who cares about getting older? There’s nothing plastic surgery can’t fix these days! Happy birthday to the woman who knows all my secrets and still loves me anyways! You’re never too old to blow out candles on a birthday cake, but we might need to keep a fire extinguisher handy this year. Happy birthday!

steps.title: Shower your bestie with love and support to celebrate her special day.
steps.content: Shower your bestie with love and support to celebrate her special day. If you want to make the birthday girl feel moved, explain why she’s so special to you. Stress how much you value your friendship with some sweet and sentimental words, and let her know that she’s a friend for life! You could also bring up qualities you admire about her, or get specific about how she’s inspired you over the years. Happy birthday, bestie! I don’t know what I’d do without you in my life. Your presence changed my life for the better. Happy birthday to an absolute angel. The world is so much more beautiful with you in it. Wishing you an amazing birthday! Best birthday wishes to the woman who does it all. I love you more than you’ll ever know! Special people like you deserve the best birthday. Happy birthday to a truly kind, caring, and one-of-a-kind woman. May your birthday be filled with boundless love, light, and positivity. You deserve it more than anyone else in the world! You have a gift for bringing out the best in people, and I am so grateful to know you. Here’s to another year of good health and happiness! I must have done something right in another life to deserve you. Thank you for being such a loving and supportive friend, and have the best birthday ever! I’ve cherished every moment we’ve spent together over the last few years, and I can’t wait to make even more incredible memories together. Happy birthday! On this special day, we celebrate not just your age but all the love, wisdom, and beautiful moments you’ve brought into the world. You’re a gift to everyone who knows you, and we’re so grateful to be part of your life. Your kindness is truly inspiring, and I dream of being 1/100th of the woman you are someday. Thank you for always being there for me and making me feel seen and heard. I’m so grateful to know you. Happy, happy birthday! Imaginative and intelligent. Full of warmth, care, and sound advice. A woman who leads with love and isn’t afraid to stand up for what’s right. These are just some of the things I admire about you, and I’m so blessed to know you. Enjoy today!

steps.title: Send a short and sweet message to share your well wishes.
steps.content: Send a short and sweet message to share your well wishes. Whether you’re writing a card , sending a text, or saying your wish in person, it’s easy to make your friend feel special on her big day. Just drop a few adjectives to describe the type of person she is, express excitement for her new personal year, or mention that you’re thinking of her. Happy cake day! Hope your birthday rocks! Hip, hip, hooray—it’s your birthday! Cheers to another year around the sun! Thinking of you today. Enjoy your special day! Today’s forecast: 100% chance of birthday fun! I can’t wait to celebrate with you! Happy birthday! Happy birthday! I hope all your dreams come true! Time to make some wishes! Happy, happy birthday to you! Sending you warm wishes for a birthday that brings you joy! Happy birthday to the most kind and thoughtful person I know! Wishing you a birthday that’s just as sweet, special, and fun as you are!

steps.title: Stress how much you miss your friend if you can’t celebrate in person.
steps.content: Stress how much you miss your friend if you can’t celebrate in person. Even if you’re not there on the big day, you can always deliver a thoughtful message to show your support. Let your friend know you’re excited to see her soon, and try to send your wishes in a physical card. Receiving something tangible is more meaningful than getting a text, so it’s the perfect gesture for a faraway friend! Here’s to another year of friendship, no matter how far apart we are. HBD! Even though we’re miles apart, you’ll always have a piece of my heart. Happy birthday, bestie! Feeling your amazingness all the way in (your city). Hope you’re feeling my happy wishes in (their city)! Happy birthday to my insanely beautiful best friend! I can’t wait to celebrate with you the next time you’re in town! I’m missing you more than ever on your big day. Hope you have a blast at your party and eat lots of chocolate cake! Me here and you there = no fair. But I know you’ll have an incredible day because it’s a celebration of incredible YOU! Wishing you a very special birthday from miles away! I hope this new personal year is full of love, joy, and lots of laughter! I might not be there to celebrate your big day but know that I’m with you in spirit! I hope you have an amazing birthday, angel! Whenever you have a moment of peace and quiet, know that I’m thinking of you today and hoping you have the best birthday ever! Happy birthday to my best friend in the whole world. I’m gutted that I can’t be there in person, but I’m sending lots of virtual hugs and kisses. Love you! Despite being in different countries, the other side of the world is still warmed by your existence. I can’t wait to visit and celebrate with you in person, bestie! I wish you didn’t live so far away so I could be there to celebrate your special day…In the meantime, I’ll be raising a glass in your honor tonight. Happy birthday, best friend!

steps.title: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words.
steps.content: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words. If you’re struggling to find the right sentiments, get help from someone else! Choose an author, celebrity, or public figure that your friend admires, then use their words to wish her a happy birthday. Whether you opt for something funny, sweet, or inspirational, it’s sure to make her feel cared for . “Youth has no age.” —Pablo Picasso “You don't get older, you get better." —Shirley Bassey “We turn not older with years, but newer every day.” —Emily Dickinson “Don’t just count your years, make your years count.” —George Meredith “The older you get the better you get, unless you are a banana.” —Betty White “You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —Les Brown “Whatever with the past has gone, the best is always yet to come.” —Lucy Larcom “As soon as I saw you I knew a grand adventure was about to happen.” —A.A. Milne “Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.” —John Lennon "The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age." ―Lucille Ball “We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.” —Bernard Baruch “Today is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be again. Make the most of it!” —Nicky Gumbel “Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.” —Decimus Magnus Ausonius

steps.title: Let your friend know that she’s still got it to lift her spirits.
steps.content: Let your friend know that she’s still got it to lift her spirits. A lot can happen in a single year, let alone 50 years, so take the opportunity to remind your friend that she’s as beautiful as ever. You could throw out a witty joke about aging, highlight her accomplishments, or tell her that she should be proud of making it this far! You put the “hot” in hot flashes. Happy 50th! 50? You don’t look a day over GORGEOUS! May the next 50 be even better than the first. I hate to use the F-word, but…you’re fifty (gasp)! Happy birthday—you’re nifty, fifty, and more fabulous than ever! Here’s to FIFTY: Fun, Incredible, Fabulous, Thrilling and Youthful! You made it to the half-century mark in style. Congrats on turning 50! 50 years young and at the top of your game. Happy birthday, best friend! You’re not just aging gracefully—you’re setting the standard for what 50 should look like! Fifty, fabulous, and only 10 years away from the senior citizen discounts. Happy birthday! I’ve watched you create an amazing life with a beautiful family. Congratulations on 50 years, my friend! Dye your hair blue, get a tattoo, learn something new, and let the midlife crisis (adventure) ensue! Happy 50th!

steps.title: Welcome her into the thirties with a fun and festive message.
steps.content: Welcome her into the thirties with a fun and festive message. Turning 30 is a major milestone that can spark various feelings, depending on who you ask. Some people have regrets about how they spent their 20s, while others are eager to start their next chapter in life. [2] X Research source Whatever the case may be, aim to make your bestie feel good, and reassure them that the best is yet to come! May your 30s be extra dirty. Damn, girl…30 looks good on you! HBD! Happy birthday! You’re thirty, flirty, and thriving! Happy birthday, bestie! You don’t look a day over 29! Three decades behind you, but the best is yet to come. Happy birthday! The countdown to your mid-life crisis has officially begun…Happy 30th birthday! Life before 30 is for making mistakes, and life after 30 is to repent for all of them. Thirty years ago, an icon was born. Happy birthday to the most poppin’ person I know! Welcome to Club 30! The hangovers might last longer, but the memories are even better! You know you’re old when the time you go to bed is the time you used to go out…Happy birthday to my semi-retired rave buddy! Hope we’re still fist-pumping it up when we’re 70.

steps.content: Drop a drinking joke or boozy pun to celebrate her 21st birthday. If your bestie is turning 21, it’s time to pull out all the stops and write the wittiest wish you’ve got. Turning 21 is nothing to wine about. Enjoy adulthood! You only turn 21 once, so make the hangover worth it! Wishing you a safe and happy 21st birthday. Welcome to adulthood! It’s time to TURN UP…because you’re officially 21! Can’t wait to go crazy tonight! Happy 21st! So glad you can finally throw out that fake ID you’ve kept hidden in your sock drawer!
